title: Monday's top brokerage calls: Bajaj Finance, Titan, Asian Paints, Dr Reddy's and Kotak Bank - CNBCTV18
content: Monday's top brokerage calls: Bajaj Finance, Titan, Asian Paints, Dr Reddy's and Kotak Bank  CNBCTV18
description: Brokerage Radar | Jefferies has initiated coverage on Bajaj Finance shares whereas Macquarie has removed Asian Paints' stock from its marquee buy list. Meanwhile, Macquarie has added Titan's stock to its marquee list and believes the jewellery company should benefit from the continued momentum in market share gains. Here is a list of brokerage calls for this morning:
